CustomField.description: Comma-separated list of Salesforce object API names that this context configuration applies to. When a conversation involves records of these types, this configuration will be used to retrieve contextual data.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Enter object API names separated by commas (e.g., "Account,Contact,Opportunity"). This configuration will activate when the conversation involves records of these types.
CustomField.label: Applicable SObject Types
